Plot: Like its first breast cancer-themed installment, Call Me Crazy aka Five 2/Five More will feature five short films featuring A-list talent both in front and behind the camera. The sequel ...
Title: Call Me Crazy: A Five Film
Writer: Deirdre O'Connor, Jan Oxenberg, Howard J. Morris, Stephen Godchaux, Erin Cressida Wilson
Director: Laura Dern, Bryce Dallas Howard, Bonnie Hunt, Ashley Judd, Sharon Maguire
Actors: Jennifer Hudson, Sarah Hyland, Melissa Leo, Mitch Rouse
